title: <:diamond_shape:1013899470867537990> Reviewer
description:
The <@&1000878482450026577> role is given to those who support our studio by reviewing one of our products with a review that is not biased or untrue and it follows our [rules](https://discord.com/channels/999634679172972646/1000891032818434108) regarding reviews.

Most reviews if not all are posted in our reviews channel, and the reviews that earn a member the reviewer role will be marked with a golden color for more recognition.
